title: TCMSP
description: TCMSP (formerly known as http://tcmspnw.com) is a database for providing systems pharmacology analysis of TCM(Traditional Chinese Medicine),including evaluating ADME, potential targets and associated diseases.
cleaned_text: systems pharmacology platform of Chinese herbal medicines that captures the relationships between drugs, targets and diseases. The database includes chemicals, targets and drug-target networks, and associated drug-target-disease networks, as well as pharmacokinetic properties for natural compounds involving oral bioavailability, drug-likeness,intestinal epithelial permeability, blood-brain-barrier, aqueous solubility and etc. This breakthrough has sparked a new interest in the search of candidate drugs in various types of traditional Chinese herbs. The authors are grateful to the [TTD](http://bidd.nus.edu.sg/group/ttd/ttd.asp) (Therapeutic Target Database), [PharmGKB](http://www.pharmgkb.org/) and [PubChem](https://pubchem.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/) database. The network viewer in our website is based on CytoscapeWeb,an interactive web-based network browser. It is freely available at . a database of systems pharmacology for drug discovery from herbal medicines. [J Cheminformatics](http://www.jcheminf.com/content/6/1/13/abstract). 2014 Apr 16;6(1):13.
